titleStmt.title: Hērō-paideia, or The institution of a young noble man by James Cleland.
titleStmt.author: Cleland, James, d. 1627.

notesStmt.note: First word of the title in Greek characters.
Running title reads: The first [-sixth] booke of noble institution.
With a slip-cancel on B1v correcting "seauen" to "sixe". Variant: without the cancel.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
